snippet: With four of the five spots for the best-actress Oscar category considered already sewn up, veteran performers, and a few newcomers, are working the circuit to secure the one in play.
abstract: Melena Ryzik observes that during this awards season several actresses are fighting for attention in attempt to secure what is considered the only open spot left in best-actress Oscar category.
lead_paragraph: With four of the five spots for the best-actress Oscar category considered already sewn up, veteran performers, and a few newcomers, are working the circuit to secure the one in play.

headline.seo: For the Oscars, Vying for One Best-Actress Slot
headline.main: A Crowded Red Carpet for Women After Oscar
headline.print_headline: A Crowded Red Carpet For Women After Oscar
